name: com.heathen.uguiextras
description: Do more with Heathen's uGUI Extras. Includes the KeyCollection an On-Screen Keyboard tool as well as Ligature tools, TreeView and other uGUI extensions and tools.

samples.description: Demonstrates the features of the KeyCollection control when used as an On Screen Keyboard
Demonstrates the Tree View control which can manage a tree of uGUI transforms (RectTransforms) as a visual tree view control
